languages.text: {n}Осуждающий взгляд Ирлиэт устремляется к Шайрэнкхею и провидцам.{/n} "Вы сами избрали сей путь. Навлекли беду не только на Крударах, но и собратьев с Алайтока. Раз за разом повторяли ошибки, ведомые страхами, глупостью или гордыней. И даже лишившись всего, лишившись... дома, вы продолжаете слепо ступать по тому же тернистому пути, не желая меняться. Нет. С меня достаточно. Я исполнила долг Изгоя сполна. Ваша судьба отныне — лишь в ваших руках".

{n}Yrliet glares accusingly at Shairenkhei and the Farseers.{/n} "You chose this path. Not only did you invite doom upon Crudarach, you have also condemned our kin on Alaitoc. You have repeated the same mistakes over and over, guided by fear, stupidity, or pride. And even after losing everything, after losing... our home, you keep following the same thorny path, unwilling to change. No. I have had enough. My duty as an Outcast is fulfilled. From now on, your fate lies in your hands."
languages.original_text: {n}Осуждающий взгляд Ирлиэт устремляется к Шайрэнкхею и провидцам.{/n} "Вы сами избрали сей путь. Навлекли беду не только на Крударах, но и собратьев с Алайтока. Раз за разом повторяли ошибки, ведомые страхами, глупостью или гордыней. И даже лишившись всего, лишившись... дома, вы продолжаете слепо ступать по тому же тернистому пути, не желая меняться. Нет. С меня достаточно. Я исполнила долг Изгоя сполна. Ваша судьба отныне — лишь в ваших руках".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet glares accusingly at Shairenkhei and the seers.{/n} "You chose this way. Not only did you invite trouble to Crudarach, you have also condemned our kinsmen at Alaitoc. You repeated mistakes over and over again, guided by fear, stupidity, or pride. And even after you lost everything, after you lost... home you keep following the same thorny path, unwilling to change. No. I have had enough. My duty as an Exile is fulfilled. From now on your fate lies in your hands."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet lanza una mirada acusadora a Shairenkhei y a los videntes.{/n} «Vosotros habéis elegido esta senda. No solo invitasteis a la desgracia en Crudarach, también habéis condenado a nuestros congéneres de Alaitoc. Habéis repetido los mismos errores una y otra vez, guiados por el miedo, la estupidez o el orgullo. E incluso después de perderlo todo, después de perder... nuestro hogar, seguís empeñados en recorrer el mismo camino espinoso, reacios al cambio. No. Ya he aguantado suficiente. He cumplido mi deber como proscrita. A partir de ahora, tomaréis vosotros mismos las riendas de vuestro destino».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet glares accusingly at Shairenkhei and the Farseers.{/n} "You chose this path. Not only did you invite doom upon Crudarach, you have also condemned our kin on Alaitoc. You have repeated the same mistakes over and over, guided by fear, stupidity, or pride. And even after losing everything, after losing... our home, you keep following the same thorny path, unwilling to change. No. I have had enough. My duty as an Outcast is fulfilled. From now on, your fate lies in your hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lanza una mirada acusadora a Shairenkhei y a los videntes.{/n} «Vosotros habéis elegido este camino. No solo pusisteis en peligro Crudarach, también habéis condenado a nuestros congéneres de Alaitoc. Habéis cometido un error tras otro guiados por el miedo, la estupidez o el orgullo. E incluso después de perderlo todo, después de perder... un hogar, seguís empeñados en recorrer el mismo camino espinoso, reacios al cambio. No. Ya he aguantado suficiente. He cumplido mi deber como proscrita. A partir de ahora, tomaréis vosotros mismos las riendas de vuestro destino».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特瞪着榭伦凯和先知，眼神中充满了责难的意味。{/n}“你们选择的这条道途，不仅为克鲁达拉赫带来了毁灭，还把我们在阿莱托克的同胞拉下了水。在恐惧、愚蠢或傲慢的驱使下，你们一次次地犯错误。即便你们失去了一切，即使你们失去了……我们的家园，你们也一直走在同样的荆棘之路上，无论如何都不肯改变。不，我已经受够了。身为流浪者，我已经完成了我的职责。如今，你们的命运全在你们自己手中了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet glares accusingly at Shairenkhei and the Farseers.{/n} "You chose this path. Not only did you invite doom upon Crudarach, you have also condemned our kin on Alaitoc. You have repeated the same mistakes over and over, guided by fear, stupidity, or pride. And even after losing everything, after losing... our home, you keep following the same thorny path, unwilling to change. No. I have had enough. My duty as an Outcast is fulfilled. From now on, your fate lies in your hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特瞪着榭伦凯和先知，眼神中充满了责难的意味。{/n}“你们选择的这条道路，不仅为克鲁达拉赫带来了毁灭，还把我们在阿莱托克的同胞拉下了水。在恐惧、愚蠢或傲慢的驱使下，你们一次次地犯错误。即便你们失去了一切，即使你们失去了……家园，你们也一直走在同样的荆棘之路上，无论如何都不肯改变。不，我已经受够了。身为流浪者，我已经完成了我的职责。如今，你们的命运全在你们自己手中了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet lance un regard accusateur à Shairenkhei et aux Grands Prophètes.{/n} « C'est la voie que vous avez choisie. Vous avez non seulement causé la chute de Crudarach, mais aussi condamné nos semblables d'Alaitoc. Vous avez refait les mêmes erreurs encore et encore, guidés par la peur, la bêtise ou la fierté, et même après avoir tout perdu, après avoir perdu... notre monde, vous continuez à suivre cette voie jonchée de ronces sans vouloir en dévier. Ça suffit. J'ai accompli mon devoir d'Errante. Désormais, votre destin repose entre vos mains. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet glares accusingly at Shairenkhei and the Farseers.{/n} "You chose this path. Not only did you invite doom upon Crudarach, you have also condemned our kin on Alaitoc. You have repeated the same mistakes over and over, guided by fear, stupidity, or pride. And even after losing everything, after losing... our home, you keep following the same thorny path, unwilling to change. No. I have had enough. My duty as an Outcast is fulfilled. From now on, your fate lies in your hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lance un regard accusateur à Shairenkhei et aux prophètes.{/n} « C'est la voie que vous avez choisie. Vous avez non seulement causé la perte de Crudarach, mais aussi condamné nos semblables d'Alaitoc. Vous avez réitéré vos erreurs encore et encore, guidés par la peur, la bêtise ou la fierté, et même après avoir tout perdu, après avoir perdu... notre monde, vous continuez à suivre cette voie jonchée de ronces sans vouloir en dévier. Ça suffit. J'ai accompli mon devoir d'Errante. Désormais, votre destin repose entre vos mains. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはシャイレンケイと先見司たちを非難するように睨みつける。{/n}「あなたたちは、この道を選んだ。クルダラに災いを招いただけでなく、アライトクにいる我らの同胞をも断罪した。恐怖、愚かさ、傲慢に導かれ、何度も何度も過ちを繰り返してきたのだ。そして、すべてを失った後も…変わろうとせず、同じ茨の道を歩み続けている。もうたくさんだ。私は追放者としての義務は果たした。これからは、あなたたちの運命は自分たちの手にかかっているのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet glares accusingly at Shairenkhei and the Farseers.{/n} "You chose this path. Not only did you invite doom upon Crudarach, you have also condemned our kin on Alaitoc. You have repeated the same mistakes over and over, guided by fear, stupidity, or pride. And even after losing everything, after losing... our home, you keep following the same thorny path, unwilling to change. No. I have had enough. My duty as an Outcast is fulfilled. From now on, your fate lies in your hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはシャイレンケイと先見司たちを非難するように睨みつける。{/n}「あなたたちは、この道を選んだ。クルダラに災いを招いただけでなく、アライトクにいる我らの同胞をも断罪した。恐怖、愚かさ、傲慢に導かれ、何度も何度も過ちを繰り返してきたのだ。そして、すべてを失った後も…変わろうとせず、同じ茨の道を歩み続けている。もうたくさんだ。私は追放者としての義務は果たした。これからは、あなたたちの運命は自分たちの手にかかっているのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet starrt Shairenkhei und die Runenpropheten vorwurfsvoll an.{/n} "Ihr habt diesen Pfad gewählt. Ihr habt nicht nur die Katastrophe über Crudarach gebracht, Ihr habt auch unsere Verwandten in Alaitoc verdammt. Ihr habt wieder und wieder dieselben Fehler wiederholt, geleitet von Angst, Dummheit oder Stolz. Und selbst, nachdem Ihr alles verloren habt, nachdem Ihr ... unsere Heimat verloren habt, folgt Ihr weiter demselben dornigen Pfad, nicht willens, Euch zu ändern. Nein. Ich habe genug. Meine Pflicht als Ausgestoßene ist erfüllt. Von nun an liegt Euer Schicksal in Euren eigenen Händen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet glares accusingly at Shairenkhei and the Farseers.{/n} "You chose this path. Not only did you invite doom upon Crudarach, you have also condemned our kin on Alaitoc. You have repeated the same mistakes over and over, guided by fear, stupidity, or pride. And even after losing everything, after losing... our home, you keep following the same thorny path, unwilling to change. No. I have had enough. My duty as an Outcast is fulfilled. From now on, your fate lies in your hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet starrt Shairenkhei und die Seher vorwurfsvoll an.{/n} "Ihr habt diesen Weg gewählt. Ihr habt nicht nur die Katastrophe über Crudarach gebracht, Ihr habt auch unsere Verwandten in Alaitoc verdammt. Ihr habt Eure Fehler wieder und wieder wiederholt, geleitet von Angst, Dummheit oder Stolz. Und selbst, nachdem Ihr alles verloren habt, nachdem Ihr ... unsere Heimat verloren habt, folgt Ihr weiter demselben dornigen Pfad, nicht willens, Euch zu ändern. Nein. Ich habe genug. Meine Pflicht als Ausgestoßene ist erfüllt. Von nun an liegt Euer Schicksal in Euren eigenen Händen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, suçlayıcı bir şekilde Shairenkhei ve Ötesezenlere bakıyor.{/n} "Bu yolu siz seçtiniz. Yalnızca Crudarach'ta felakete davetiye çıkarmadınız, aynı zamanda Alaitoc'taki soydaşlarımızın da başını belaya soktunuz. Korku, ahmaklık ya da kibirden aynı hataları sil baştan tekrarlayıp durdunuz. Her şeyi kaybettikten... Yuvamızı kaybettikten sonra bile değişime karşı inat ederek aynı dikenli yolu takip ettiniz. Hayır, bana bu kadarı yeter. Bir Yurtsuz olarak görevimi tamamladım. Bundan sonra kaderiniz kendi ellerinizde."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet glares accusingly at Shairenkhei and the Farseers.{/n} "You chose this path. Not only did you invite doom upon Crudarach, you have also condemned our kin on Alaitoc. You have repeated the same mistakes over and over, guided by fear, stupidity, or pride. And even after losing everything, after losing... our home, you keep following the same thorny path, unwilling to change. No. I have had enough. My duty as an Outcast is fulfilled. From now on, your fate lies in your hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, suçlayıcı bir şekilde Shairenkhei ve Ötesezenlere bakıyor.{/n} "Bu yolu siz seçtiniz. Yalnızca Crudarach'ta felakete davetiye çıkarmadınız, aynı zamanda Alaitoc'taki soydaşlarımızı da mahkûm ettiniz. Korku, ahmaklık ya da kibirden aynı hataları sil baştan tekrarlayıp durdunuz. Her şeyi kaybettikten... Yuvamızı kaybettikten sonra bile değişime karşı inat ederek aynı dikenli yolu takip ettiniz. Hayır, bana bu kadarı yeter. Bir Yurtsuz olarak görevimi tamamladım. Bundan sonra kaderiniz kendi ellerinizde."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
